stimulusHtml: Which of the following visual features is intentionally included by artists to help the viewer to link a Ndop (portrait figure) with a specific named individual?
choicesHtml: A projecting headdress that is placed on the figureâ€™s head
A naturalistic likeness with a unique facial expression
A geometric motif pattern sculpted on the front of the base
A set of royal regalia, such as belts, armbands, and bracelets
